fulltext: f843c67a492311e2a2aa782bcb07413511cf382137004b7f8961efc791d9586a;2018-11-15T16:39:59Z;corpus;corpus:text;Spoken Corpus Mozambique ;The Spoken Corpus Mozambique contains approximately 121,958 running words of spoken Portuguese from Mozambique. It includes 40 transcriptions of spoken recordings (in a total of 40 hours of recordings) that were recorded between 1986 and 1987.;2013-01-21
name: 22eb629a-98b1-58d1-8a8f-76a1f249da4d
notes: The Spoken Corpus Mozambique contains approximately 121,958 running words of spoken Portuguese from Mozambique. It includes 40 transcriptions of spoken recordings (in a total of 40 hours of recordings) that were recorded between 1986 and 1987.
title: Spoken Corpus Mozambique
